I introduced the Jennifer Kepner HOPE Act, in honor of Air Force Staff Sgt. Jennifer Kepner from Cathedral City. Jennifer was a medic who served in Iraq in 2004 and died in 2017 of pancreatic cancer, likely caused by her exposure to the massive 10-acre burn pit at Balad.
